instance

public static Utterances instance()
Returns the current instance of the Utterances singleton. This singleton can change during load process.

Returns:
current instance of Utterances singleton

setInstance

public static void setInstance(Utterances instance)
Changes reference to current instance of Utterances singleton Used with serialization - after loading.

Parameters:
instance - reference to new Utterances singleton

emptyInstance

public static void emptyInstance()
Empty whole the Utterances before the XML load. We just drop the singleton and create a new one.
